sentences.sContent: There has been much debate on the new teaching method invented by a young educationist .
sentences.sContent_eng: There has been much debate on the new teaching method invented by a young educationist .
sentences.sCn: 这个由一位年轻的教育家发明的新教学方法引起了很大的争议。

sentences.sContent: As a representative figure during French Renaissance, Rabelais is not only a famous writer, but a renowned educationist.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a representative figure during French Renaissance, Rabelais is not only a famous writer, but a renowned educationist.
sentences.sCn: 法国文艺复兴时期代表人物拉伯雷不仅是一位著名的作家，还是著名的教育家。

words.tran: 教育家；教育工作者；教师
训练；教导；培育（educate的过去分词形式）
